net.antidot.api.search
Class QueryCoder

java.lang.Object
  net.antidot.api.search.QueryCoder

public class QueryCoder
extends java.lang.Object

Encodes/decodes queries.

Creates query from current parameters or generates appropriate links. Instance of this class should be used when generating result pages.

Constructor Summary
QueryCoder(java.lang.String uri, CoderManager coderMgr)
          Constructs new query encoder.
 
Method Summary
 Query decode(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> parameters)
          Creates new query from parameters.
 java.lang.String generateLink(Query query)
          Generates links for the given query.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

QueryCoder

public QueryCoder(java.lang.String uri,
                  CoderManager coderMgr)
Constructs new query encoder.

Parameters:
uri - [in] URI base path.
coderMgr - [in] coder manager (feed coder, filter coder...). It is used for link generation.
Method Detail

decode

public Query decode(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> parameters)
Creates new query from parameters.

This method should be called with parameters coming from URL parameters.

Parameters:
parameters - [in] parameters used to initialize the query.
coderMgr - [in] manager for various coders (feed, filter...).
Returns:
newly created query.

generateLink

public java.lang.String generateLink(Query query)
                              throws java.net.URISyntaxException
Generates links for the given query.

Parameters:
query - [in] query to encode in order to generate corresponding link.
Returns:
URI corresponding to provided query.
Throws:
java.net.URISyntaxException - cannot generate link. It should only happen when the query encoder has been initialized with bad URI.
